nodes.documentation: @dev VoteCast event is called whenever a vote is cast that can potentially close the proposal.
nodes.name: VoteCast

nodes.documentation:
@dev ProposalAccepted event is called when a proposal is accepted so that a server can listen that can
      call any offchain actions
nodes.name: ProposalAccepted

nodes.documentation: @dev CloseProposalOnTime event is called whenever a proposal is created or updated to close it on time.
nodes.name: CloseProposalOnTime

nodes.documentation: @dev ActionSuccess event is called whenever an onchain action is executed.
nodes.name: ActionSuccess
createProposal
updateProposal

nodes.documentation: @dev Categorizes proposal to proceed further. Categories shows the proposal objective.
nodes.name: categorizeProposal
submitProposalWithSolution
createProposalwithSolution
submitVote
